sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2014, then it decrease greatly with steady steps by 2017; while America decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2017.

sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2014, then it decrease greatly with steady steps by 2017; while America decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2017.
